chapter.title: More information and support

formalpara.title: If you need more information and support
formalpara.para: First, read the NHibernate documentation! Check out the online NHibernate documentation (contains the lastest articles) and read How To Ask For Help.

chapter.para: Since this is an Open Source project which most of us work on in our spare time, you will be getting a limited support. If you do find a bug or have a comment, you can post it on the NHibernate forum or use the bug tracker or the development mailing list. We'll try really hard to help you out.
Pierre Henri Kuaté - The NHibernate Team.
